com.android.slackandhay.input
Class InputTouchButton

java.lang.Object
  com.android.slackandhay.input.InputTouchButton

public class InputTouchButton
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to define Buttons on the touch screen The Buttons are defined independently from the screen resolution. Thats why the position is somewhere between 0f and 1f. eg if the horizontal resolution is 1024px and the button position is set to 0.5f, then the button begins at 512px.

Author:
tom
